-JYI520wUDqM1MFo8z_s.name: Acquabot
-JYI520wUDqM1MFo8z_s.showcase_overview: Robotic pool cleaning pioneer Aquabot needed to stand out in a competitive market. A rebrand inspired by what really matters to pool owners—clean, refreshing water—was the answer. With a new manifesto, position, logo, visual language, and brand voice, the result was a revitalized brand with clearer market recognition.

slidesimages.caption: We dove deep and found the reasons the consumer cares about their pool. It's about emotion not tech specs.
The audience needed to feel the new Aquabot brand.
A new website communicated the new market positioning

-JYI7sJgoqnXEMWLOa3E.name: Hexagon
-JYI7sJgoqnXEMWLOa3E.showcase_overview: For HxGN LIVE 2014, we went big. Real big. We designed an incredibly dynamic set with seven projection zones, allowing us to create a projection-mapping experience unlike anything done before. The mind-blowing visuals opened Hexagon’s conference with a bang, and the live-streaming microsite hooked in more than 7,000 viewers from 83 different countries.

-JYI9C7cfvkb3TsdCqHm.name: Analog Devices
-JYI9C7cfvkb3TsdCqHm.showcase_overview: At Analog Devices, the future is now in progress. We themed Analyst Day 2014 after this very fact and we took over the NASDAQ building to get the message across.

slidesimages.caption: Analyst Day 2014 deserved a big stage. We thought Times Square would do.

-JYIAc76eOKV76grg-9O.name: Cynosure
-JYIAc76eOKV76grg-9O.showcase_overview: To prepare for the acquisition of Palomar, one of its main competitors, Cynosure partnered with Cramer to develop marketing assets that would communicate the value proposition of this new brand. Cramer wrote a powerful brand manifesto to extol the virtues of the newly combined company for customers, prospects, partners, and analysts. Then we launched a website to solidify the brand positioning.

slidesimages.caption: A brand new site communicated the new Cynosure brand values and positioning.

-JYIC-jVqewnuXAoC0Kv.cta_text: Removing the blinders on a new global vision
-JYIC-jVqewnuXAoC0Kv.name: Luxottica
-JYIC-jVqewnuXAoC0Kv.short_description: Removing the blinders on a new global vision
-JYIC-jVqewnuXAoC0Kv.showcase_overview: At its 2014 National Sales Meeting in Kapalua, Maui, Luxottica needed to align its teams around a new global vision and messaging platform. Cramer helped by integrating Hawaiian culture and style into every pre-show, at-show, and post-show experience to take this group of 450 eyewear fashion leaders on a journey from their past to their future brand.

slidesimages.caption: At Luxottica's 2014 National Sales Meeting, we had the team say "Aloha" to their new future
Attendees rode the wave of a new company wide vision

-JYIDJ9XiOPustiNddNd.cta_text: Improving patient care through intuitive design
-JYIDJ9XiOPustiNddNd.name: Pri-Med
-JYIDJ9XiOPustiNddNd.short_description: Improving patient care through intuitive design
-JYIDJ9XiOPustiNddNd.showcase_overview: Pri-Med's InLight is a cloud-based EHR access platform that takes the headaches out of medical care.

-JYIFoOY-xfHWOPsx7FN.name: VCE
-JYIFoOY-xfHWOPsx7FN.showcase_overview: In a dark time of static and inflexible data centers, where imposters peddling inferior IT products lurk behind every corner, only one man has the powers to defend our precious world from infrastructure disaster. He has dedicated his life to right IT wrongs and to promote product truth, customer justice, and the VCE way. As long as there is IT injustice in the world, he’ll be there with VCE’s true converged infrastructure on his side. He is: Vblock Man.

slidesimages.caption: Vblock Man. Defending our world from IT infrastructure disasters.

-JYIGnl1adrYqmzHrkuK.name: Fidelity
-JYIGnl1adrYqmzHrkuK.showcase_overview: Fidelity came to Cramer looking to produce a video campaign that spoke to their three key demographic personas when it came to retirement planning. We brought these pieces to life with a RED camera shoot.

-JYILJV8M78Z8VKSYvC8.cta_text: Getting to the heart of the problem
-JYILJV8M78Z8VKSYvC8.name: BG Medicine
-JYILJV8M78Z8VKSYvC8.short_description: Getting to the heart of the problem
-JYILJV8M78Z8VKSYvC8.showcase_overview: With the development of the first blood test for galectin-3 mediated heart failure, BG Medicine needed to address the human need head-on. Cramer helped the company transform its science-driven story into a commercial one. We used this story arc to guide content strategy, a website redesign, and video animation that won three Telly awards.

slidesimages.caption: So when BG Medicine came to us for a website refresh and clinical animation, we quickly saw they needed an important element: a story. We created a narrative—disease, impact, test—that explained how this new advancement has the potential to change the way we think about chronic heart failure. And this guided everything, from the site design to content strategy to the clinical animation.

-JYINpmeLHUgD6sL6z-S.cta_text: Inspiring innovation from inside the studio
-JYINpmeLHUgD6sL6z-S.name: Solidworks
-JYINpmeLHUgD6sL6z-S.short_description: Inspiring innovation from inside the studio
-JYINpmeLHUgD6sL6z-S.showcase_overview: SOLIDWORKS 2015 inspires design and business innovation with new tools and capabilities to improve everyday productivity, optimize development from design to downstream production, and expand into new markets. We brought this vision to life from within the Cramer studio walls with a live record projection mapped environment.

slidesimages.caption: A dynamic projection mapped environment brought this demo to life

-JYIQT5PrFSQZr53r92z.name: Qlik
-JYIQT5PrFSQZr53r92z.showcase_overview: For Qlik, a web analytics company, generating more leads for its marketing dollar meant transitioning its road show to a virtual space. QlikView—our customer-facing, fully integrated virtual event experience—accrued registrants and attendees 40% over the goal, surging past expectations.

slidesimages.caption: Qlik has pioneered new ways of transforming data into meaningful information in order to drive smarter, faster decisions. Now they needed a new way to generate sales and engage customers and prospects.

-JYIRGL1jsNI0FdLwOqZ.name: BBH
-JYIRGL1jsNI0FdLwOqZ.showcase_overview: Brown Brothers Harriman needed a unique interactive display built to communicate their company history and brand values to key stakeholders and prospects. We gave them a beautifully innovative experience.

-JYISS-XFkZfvh0Amg7l.cta_text: A workforce focused Rube Goldberg machine
-JYISS-XFkZfvh0Amg7l.name: ADP
-JYISS-XFkZfvh0Amg7l.short_description: A workforce focused Rube Goldberg machine
-JYISS-XFkZfvh0Amg7l.showcase_overview: You've seen these machines done by Rube Goldberg. They're pretty cool. Well, we animated one for ADP. And yes, it's pretty cool.

-JYIT0C45_8OLHFKGVYu.cta_text: Bringing skin health expertise to the table and beyond
-JYIT0C45_8OLHFKGVYu.name: Elizabeth Arden Rx
-JYIT0C45_8OLHFKGVYu.short_description: Bringing skin health expertise to the table and beyond

team.dek: the people who spend their days writing on walls and wrangling with the toughest challenges in the business.
team.intro_paragraph: We’re an eclectic family with electric chemistry. A multi-disciplinarian smorgasbord working in harmony to create the memorable experiences that elevate brands.
team.meta_description: These are people who spend their days writing on walls and wrangling with the toughest challenges in the business. We’re an eclectic family with electric chemistry. A multi-disciplinarian smorgasbord working in harmony to create the memorable experiences that elevate brands.

A multi-disciplinarian smorgasbord working in harmony to create the memorable experiences that elevate brands.

-JYI--cuOYkOqecg6-2k.name: Ann Cave
-JYI--cuOYkOqecg6-2k.quote: Baseball-watching, chocolate enthusiast who believes life is too short to drink bad wine.

-JYI71vYK1qmxS7g5ePP.name: Brent Turner
-JYI71vYK1qmxS7g5ePP.quote: Overseer of family Lego projects who aspires to be Coach Taylor of “Friday Night Lights.”

-JYI9thaCzkpKNdd2tAX.name: Greg Martin
-JYI9thaCzkpKNdd2tAX.quote: Avid golfer and skier who derives his energy from Chicken Parm and often has to say, “Let’s go. The bus is leaving.”

-JYIAyZg-64sKWUnYZKN.name: Julie Ogles
-JYIAyZg-64sKWUnYZKN.quote: Cheers on her children from the sidelines of various fields while dreaming of eating ice cream in a sugar cone somewhere warm with an ocean view.

-JYIDEMoVMDeM0aSeYjR.name: Pat Martin
-JYIDEMoVMDeM0aSeYjR.quote: Golfer who golfs with friends, golfs with his kids, watches golf, and organizes his golf clubs when he isn’t golfing.

-JYIEWMNCtXeXrB_3A8I.name: Rich Sturchio
-JYIEWMNCtXeXrB_3A8I.quote: Cook, gardener, and tinkerer on an old British car who never met a pasta he didn’t love.

-JYIGsPBSifLyNjz10LB.name: Thom Faria
-JYIGsPBSifLyNjz10LB.quote: Proud husband, father, and grandfather who sees no reason to live anywhere but New England and believes that it’s not how you fall in life, but how you get up that counts.

-JYII3sk-sco0SepZr74.name: Tim Martin
-JYII3sk-sco0SepZr74.quote: World-traveling, sailing lover who draws inspiration from the great Bobby Orr while winning the State Father Son Golf Tournament.

work.clients_description_text:
Our work represents more than our partnerships with some of the world’s best-known brands. These brands are symbols of meaningful relationships, many of which span across several decades. They are the clients who come to us with their most complex brand challenges.

And, together, we solve them.

Because behind each of our engagements is the story of audience insights and our expertise in using these insights to transform audience behavior and build brand loyalty. Our clients know how the content-oriented, brand experiences we create deliver results.
work.dek: virtual universities, journeys through the human body, pop up cities, a five-part exploration of cyber threats, 80 foot executive presentations, sports hero documentaries, cinema spoofs, musical interludes, superhero social media campaigns, identity transformations, and just about anything else we’ve dreamed up for our clients. Take a look around to see what we can do for you.
work.hed: We spend our days with futuristic robots,
work.name: Work
work.og_description: Our work represents more than our partnerships with some of the world’s best-known brands. These brands are symbols of meaningful relationships, many of which span across several decades. They are the clients who come to us with their most complex brand challenges.
